title: Article on West Indies migration - causation

content.question: The influx of Afro-Caribbean immigrants described in the source was a consequence of which of the following?

choices.label: The Caribbean Red Summer, which led Afro-Caribbeans to seek refuge from racial violence
The success of Spanish families moving North during the Great Migration
The decline of Caribbean economies during the First World War
The funds raised by African American community outreach to help Afro-Caribbeans immigrate to the United States

content.answer: The decline of Caribbean economies during the First World War

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
